title: Minimum and Maximum Array Values
description: In this lab, we will explore how to find the minimum and maximum values of an array based on a provided function. We will use the reduce() method in combination with a comparator function to return the appropriate element in the array. By the end of the lab, you will have a good understanding of how to use this method to find the minimum and maximum values in an array based on your custom comparator function.

meta.title: Find Min & Max in Array | Array Reduce | Comparator Function
meta.description: Learn how to find the minimum and maximum values in an array using the reduce() method and a custom comparator function. Explore practical examples and gain a deeper understanding of this powerful technique.
meta.keywords: array, reduce, comparator, min, max, find, javascript

steps.title: Min and Max of Array Based on Provided Function

verify.name: Verify Node Commands History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 数组的最小值和最大值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何根据给定函数找到数组中的最小值和最大值。我们将结合使用reduce()方法和比较函数来返回数组中的合适元素。在实验结束时，你将很好地理解如何使用此方法根据自定义比较函数找到数组中的最小值和最大值。

meta.title: 在数组中查找最小值和最大值 | 数组归约 | 比较函数
meta.description: 学习如何使用reduce()方法和自定义比较函数在数组中查找最小值和最大值。探索实际示例并更深入地理解这一强大技术。
meta.keywords: 数组, 归约, 比较器, 最小值, 最大值, 查找, JavaScript
